## Source: ossf-package-analysis (e31235ced932a06aa97ace0640c50400f6a56221e702267eeff05b03eb7fa21a)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'orbit-playroom' @ 0.0.1 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
